citeinfo.origin: Wildland Fire Science, Earth Resources Observation and Science Center, U.S. Geological Survey
citeinfo.title: LANDFIRE.US_SLP

descript.abstract: This file is generated from 3DEP 1/3rd arc-second DEM that has been clipped to the LANDFIRE boundary. The slope raster data were created using the degree slope algorithm in GDAL version 2.0.12.
descript.purpose: The slope grid provides value between 0 and 90 degrees that represent the deviation from the horizontal elevation.

idinfo.useconst: None. Acknowledgement of the U.S. Geological Survey would be appreciated in products derived from these data.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Steepness of the surface to the nearest degree

cntperp.cntper: Wildland Fire Science, Earth Resources Observation and Science Center, U.S. Geological Survey

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
